com.stripe.stripeterminal

Interface DiscoveryListener


  • public interface DiscoveryListener
    The DiscoveryListener is notified whenever the set of Readers available for connection is updated. https://stripe.com/docs/terminal/readers/connecting

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onUpdateDiscoveredReaders(java.util.List<Reader> readers)
      This method will be called repeatedly until: - an error occurs - Terminal.discoverReaders(com.stripe.stripeterminal.DiscoveryConfiguration, com.stripe.stripeterminal.DiscoveryListener, com.stripe.stripeterminal.Callback) is canceled - Terminal.connectReader(com.stripe.stripeterminal.Reader, com.stripe.stripeterminal.ReaderCallback) is called with a discovered reader You should *not* cache the Reader objects in the readers list.

    • Method Detail

      • onUpdateDiscoveredReaders

        void onUpdateDiscoveredReaders(java.util.List<Reader> readers)
        This method will be called repeatedly until: - an error occurs - Terminal.discoverReaders(com.stripe.stripeterminal.DiscoveryConfiguration, com.stripe.stripeterminal.DiscoveryListener, com.stripe.stripeterminal.Callback) is canceled - Terminal.connectReader(com.stripe.stripeterminal.Reader, com.stripe.stripeterminal.ReaderCallback) is called with a discovered reader You should *not* cache the Reader objects in the readers list. In other words, after calling Terminal.connectReader(com.stripe.stripeterminal.Reader, com.stripe.stripeterminal.ReaderCallback) with a discovered reader, you should not attempt to cache and re-use the Reader object. The connectivity information associated with the discovered Reader object will become stale. Your app should display an updating list of discovered readers if your user is connecting to a reader for the first time. Otherwise, you may automatically select a previously saved reader. Once a selection has been made, call the Terminal.connectReader(com.stripe.stripeterminal.Reader, com.stripe.stripeterminal.ReaderCallback) method to begin connecting to the reader.
        Parameters:
        readers - the Readers found during discoverReaders.
